vclaim: Children’s book author and artist Eric Carle said his publisher forced him to add the stomachache scene to “The Very Hungry Caterpillar.” He also added that such a scene “ran entirely contrary to the message of the book.”
title: Did Eric Carle Say Publishers Made Him Add Stomachache Scene to ‘The Very Hungry Caterpillar’?
subtitle: Carle allegedly said the scene "compromised the book."
author: Nur Ibrahim
